alert.note: Alert for Northwest Nicholas (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 2:40PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong, heavy thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nicholas and northern Fayette Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 239 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong, heavy thunderstorm over Hawks Nest State Park, or near Fayetteville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Montgomery, Ansted, Smithers, Gauley Bridge, Hawks Nest State Park, Powellton, Kesslers Cross Lanes, Drennan, and Swiss. This includes Route 19 between mile markers 18 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this and other heavy storms in the area, and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
